Notice.Description:
Instructions for Mod Organizer 2 users:
1. Add Bethini Pie as an executable and run through Mod Organizer 2.
2. Leave the INI Path below at the default Documents\My Games\Starfield location. Do NOT redirect to your profile location.

Game Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the game directory.

INI Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the INI files.

Window Resolution.tooltip: Changes the resolution in windowed mode.

Upscaling Method.tooltip: Sets the upscaling technology method used.

VRS Variance Cutoff.tooltip: Sets the variable rate shading variance cutoff.

Render Resolution Scale.tooltip: Sets the internal render resolution scale that will then be upscaled to your resolution. This slider is bigger than the in-game slider, and will very much improve performance if set lower, at the expense of visuals.

Min Render Resolution Scale.tooltip: Sets the minimum internal render resolution scale that will then be upscaled to your resolution. This allows you to adjust what the minimum amount you can set it to is.

Dynamic Resolution Scale.tooltip: Sets the dynamic render resolution scale, where the game automatically adjusts resolution in performance-heavy scenes.

Min Dynamic Resolution Scale.tooltip: Sets the minimum dynamic render resolution scale. This allows you to adjust what the minimum amount you can set it to is.

First Person FOV.tooltip: Sets the field of view in first person mode.

Third Person FOV.tooltip: Sets the field of view in third person mode.

Film Grain.tooltip: Sets the intensity of the film grain effect.

Always Active.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the game to remain active when it is out of focus (i.e. if in a windowed mode setup, if one clicks outside the game window with this enabled, the game will not pause).

Always On Top.tooltip: Toggles the ability for the game window to always be the top-most window.

VSync.tooltip: Toggles vertical synchronization (VSync), which removes screen tearing.

Depth of Field.tooltip: Toggles depth of field (DOF), a kind of blurring to imitate the human eye's perception.

Reset to Default.tooltip:
Resets your INI files to their default values.

Note that not all settings will be set to their default values, as you probably don't want us to touch your screen resolution and mouse look sensitivity... that sorta thing ;)

Apply Recommended Tweaks.tooltip: This sets certain recommended tweaks for all users.

Bethini Presets.tooltip:
Changes the preset buttons to use Bethini Presets.

Hint: These presets are better ;)

Vanilla Presets.tooltip: Changes the preset buttons to use the vanilla presets.

Load Loose Files.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the game to load unarchived data files.

Message of the Day.tooltip: Toggles the message of the day. Disable in order to stop it from causing issues loading mods from the game Data directory

Photo Mode Folder.tooltip:
Sets the photo mode folder. Set to something that does not have "Data" in it to stop it from causing issues loading mods from the game Data directory.

Leave it at default Data\Textures\Photos if using Mod Organizer.

French: Starfield - Voices_fr01.ba2, Starfield - Voices_fr02.ba2, Starfield - Voices_fr_Patch.ba2
German: Starfield - Voices_de01.ba2, Starfield - Voices_de02.ba2, Starfield - Voices_de_Patch.ba2
Spanish: Starfield - Voices_es01.ba2, Starfield - Voices_es02.ba2, Starfield - Voices_es_Patch.ba2
Japanese: Starfield - Voices_ja01.ba2, Starfield - Voices_ja02.ba2, Starfield - Voices_ja_Patch.ba2

Main Menu Delay.tooltip: Toggles the 5 second delay loading the main menu.

Max Autosaves.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of autosaves to keep.

Save on Travel.tooltip: Toggles autosaves made after traveling to different locations.

Exit Saves.tooltip: Toggles exit saves made when quitting the game.

Save on Pause.tooltip: Toggles autosaves made upon closing certain menus that pause the game.

Save on Pause Timer.tooltip: Sets the timer to make a new autosave upon closing a menu.

Missing Content Warning.tooltip: Toggles the missing content warning when loading a saved game missing a previously enabled plugin.

Always Run by Default.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the character to always run by default. If turned off, you can still run, but walking is the default action.

Boost Shaking.tooltip: Toggles the camera shaking when boosting your ship.

Combat Dialogue.tooltip: Toggles those cheeky comments that enemies say while in combat.

NPCs Use Ammo.tooltip: Toggles off unlimited NPC ammo. If enabled, NPCs will no longer have access to unlimited ammo, but shall be forced to only use the ammo they possess.

Over-Encumbered Reminder.tooltip: Sets the time interval between subsequent "You are carrying too much to be able to run" messages in seconds.

Background Load Scripting VM.tooltip: Toggles loading the scripting data in the VM in the background. Skyrim and Skyrim Special Edition defaults it to off, while Fallout 4 and Starfield defaults it to on.

Post-Load Update Time.tooltip: Sets time, in milliseconds, given to scripts to update after loading.

Max Allocated Memory.tooltip: Sets the maximum memory that Papyrus can hold at a time.

Logging.tooltip: Toggles Papyrus logs being written to disk.

Debug Info.tooltip: Toggles additional debug information. If enabled, line number information will be available in error traces at the expense of higher memory usage.

Profiling.tooltip: Toggles script profiling, which enables profiling commands and allows profiling information to be logged, at the cost of some script performance.

Dialogue Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are directly talking to you.

General Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are not directly talking to you.

Floating Quest Markers.tooltip: Toggles floating quest markers on items and characters.

Letterboxed Photo Mode.tooltip: Toggles if photo mode will be letterboxed.

Max Buffer Size.tooltip: Sets the maximum memory buffer size that the console can use to display output. Increase this if you need to dump a lot from the console.

Screen Percentage.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the screen that the in-game console can fill.

Text Size.tooltip: Sets the size for text in the in-game console.

Text Input Color.tooltip: Sets the color of text typed into the console.

Text Output Color.tooltip: Sets the color of the text output in the console.

Selection Color.tooltip: Sets the color items selected while in the console.

Invert Y.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the the mouse to be inverted over the y-axis (up and down movement).

Look Sensitivity.tooltip: Sets the look sensitivity (how fast the camera moves in response to the mouse).

X Scale.tooltip: Sets the mouse horizontal scale value (how much the camera moves when moving the mouse horizontally).

Y Scale.tooltip: Sets the mouse vertical scale value (how much the camera moves when moving the mouse vertically).

Mouse Wheel Zoom Speed.tooltip: Sets the transition speed when zooming in and out in third person mode using the mouse wheel. This also affects how fast the transition from first to third person occurs.

Grass Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where grass starts to fade.

Grass Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the grass fade range distance. Grass extends this far past the Grass Fade Start, but gradually fades out.

Random Cull Start Distance.tooltip: Sets the distance that random culling starts.

Dominant Stochastic Tiling.tooltip: Toggles stochastic tiling of terrain in the dominant plane.

Displacement Error Threshold.tooltip: Sets the terrain displacement error threshold.

Reflection Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of reflections. Values above 256 can come with a high performance penalty, or even CTD. Values below 64 will cause CTD. Low is 64, Medium is 128, High and Ultra is 256.

Probe Array Size.tooltip: Sets the reflection probe array size. Seems to have minimal impact on performance. 24 is Low, Medium, and High, and 32 is Ultra.

Probe Faces Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the number of reflection probe faces to render per frame. Seems to have minimal impact on performance. 2 is Low and Medium, 3 is High, and 6 is Ultra.

Shadow Cascade Split Distance 1.tooltip: Sets the distance for the first shadow cascade split in meters.

Shadow Cascade Split Distance 2.tooltip: Sets the distance for the second shadow cascade split in meters.

Shadow Cascade Split Distance 3.tooltip: Sets the distance for the third shadow cascade split in meters.

Shadow Cascade Split Distance 4.tooltip: Sets the distance for the fourth shadow cascade split in meters.

Dynamic Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the dynamic shadow map count.

4096 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 4096 resolution shadow maps.

2048 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 2048 resolution shadow maps.

1024 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 1024 resolution shadow maps.

512 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 512 resolution shadow maps.

256 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 256 resolution shadow maps.

128 Shadow Map Count.tooltip: Sets the amount of 128 resolution shadow maps.

Focus Shadow Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of focus shadows, which are typically high quality ones you are focusing on.

Directional Light Shadow Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of directional light shadows.

Terrain Shadow Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of terrain shadows.

Shadow Filtering.tooltip: Sets the quality of shadow filtering.

Contact Shadows.tooltip: Sets the quality of shadow filtering.

Contact Shadows Half Resolution.tooltip: Toggles using half the resolution on any contact shadows.

Space Station Focus Shadows.tooltip: Toggles focus shadows in the player space station.

Distant Mid Attenuation Distance.tooltip: Sets the distant mid attenuation distance.

Distant Mid Thickness Correction.tooltip: Sets the distant mid beta thickness correction.

Distant Far Attenuation Distance.tooltip: Sets the distant far attenuation distance.

Distant Far Thickness Correction.tooltip: Sets the distant far beta thickness correction.

Disable Gore.tooltip: Toggles gory effects, such as blood.

Decal Lifetime.tooltip: Sets the time in seconds that some decals will stay visible.

Max Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of decals that can be shown per frame.

Decal Distance.tooltip: Sets the distance that some decals will show, such as bullet impacts.

Decal Distance Space.tooltip: Sets the distance that some decals will show, such as bullet impacts, in space.

Max Skinned Decals.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals.

Max Skinned Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals that can be shown per frame.

Max Skinned Decals Per Actor.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals per actor.

Particle Lighting.tooltip: Sets the particle lighting count quality.

Half Resolution Fog Map Blur.tooltip: Toggles half resolution fog map blur.

Volumetric Indirect Fallback.tooltip: Toggles volumetric indirect lighting force fallback.

Level 1 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 1 block distance. This is the distance that level 1 object LOD is shown.

Level 2 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 2 block distance. This is the distance that level 2 object LOD is shown.

Level 4 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 4 block distance. This is the distance that level 4 object LOD is shown.

Level 8 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 8 block distance. This is the distance that level 8 object LOD is shown.
